definition: Li (c. 2000 BC), sixth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Ai 哀[Ai1]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
not to deviate an iota (idiom)/to be extremely accurate
a tiny lapse can lead to a huge mistake (idiom); a minor discrepancy leading to enormous losses
pinyin: shi1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , cha4 zhi1 qian1 li3

definition: a tiny lapse can lead to a huge mistake (idiom); a minor discrepancy leading to enormous losses
pinyin: shi1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , cha4 yi3 qian1 li3

definition: the slightest difference leads to a huge loss (idiom)/a miss is as good as a mile
pinyin: cha1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , shi1 zhi1 qian1 li3

definition: the slightest difference leads to a huge error (idiom)/a miss is as good as a mile
pinyin: cha1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , miu4 yi3 qian1 li3

definition: to analyze in the finest detail

sentences.english: Secondly, Shan Shili's Activities and Ideological Views in Japan and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 第二，單士釐在日俄活動的考察及其思想主張。

sentences.english: A deep change is coming and it aims to transform several life phellolosophelloes.
sentences.chinese: 一場深刻的釐革已到來，它要改變咱們的餬口理念。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Shan Shili's contributions to culture communication between China and Western Europe in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，單士釐對近代中西文化交流的貢獻。

sentences.english: Our interest rate is as low as 0. 4% flat per month.
sentences.chinese: 我們的利率月息低至平息四釐。

sentences.english: Will China's one-child policy change in 2010?
sentences.chinese: 2010年中國的計生政策將產生釐革嗎？

sentences.english: They can seperate facts from opinions and don't pretend to have all the answers.
sentences.chinese: 他們釐得清事實與觀點，不會佯言無所不知。

sentences.english: Theory of Mozi and theory of Qinhuali have nothing debatable.
sentences.chinese: 墨子及禽滑釐的學說並無爭議。

sentences.english: And last year we sold over 300 tons of cherries.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我們賣掉了300噸車釐子。

sentences.english: Our age is witnessing a professionasfound politicas change.
sentences.chinese: 我們的時代是深切釐革的見證。

sentences.english: At least one flophouse survives on the Bowery.
sentences.chinese: 包釐街上至少開有一家廉價旅館。

sentences.english: The more subtle change has been around the house.
sentences.chinese: 更眇小的釐革產生在家裏。

sentences.english: Shan Shili is a feminine traveller and having the first traveling text spread for eraly modern.
sentences.chinese: 單士釐爲近代女遊並有文本流傳的第一人。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen. our bank will offer you a 10.25% interest rate.
sentences.chinese: 陳先生，銀行會爲你提供十釐二五的按揭利率。

sentences.english: C: Mr. Chen, our bank will offer you a 10.25% interest rate.
sentences.chinese: 陳先生，銀行會爲你提供十釐二五的按揭利率。

sentences.english: Subject to Clause 11 hereof, all stamp duty shall be borne by the Purchaser.
sentences.chinese: 除第11項所規定外，買方須支付所有釐印費。

sentences.english: Garnish with lettuce and cherry tomato. Serve with sweet chilli sauce .
sentences.chinese: 放上生菜和車釐茄裝飾，伴以甜辣醬享用。

definition: to estimate/to fine (archaic)/variant of 資|资[zi1]
(old) candidate who has successfully passed the first grades of the examination system, but not yet the court examination (殿試|殿试[dian4 shi4])

feudal vassal/feudal princes, esp. the monarchs (dukes or princes) of the several vassal states 諸侯國|诸侯国 of Zhou during Western Zhou and Spring and Autumn periods 11th-5th century BC/subordinate warlord/local official
posthumous name or title/to confer a posthumous title
to carry on/to succeed (of a familial line)/to inherit
Guangyun, Chinese rime dictionary 韻書|韵书[yun4 shu1] from 11th century, containing 26,194 single-character entries
